attributes.action: Make dental practices take more NHS patients to reduce the inequality
attributes.background: Dental practices take some NHS patients but not nearly enough. Many people are unable to access NHS dental care

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual providers, but you might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576982
